articles.title: The Genesis of Jupiters: Incredible New Image Reveals Secrets of Planet Birth - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A spectacular new image released by the European Southern Observatory (ESO) gives us clues about how planets as massive as Jupiter could form. Using ESO’s Very Large Telescope (VLT) and the Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array (ALMA), researchers have…
articles.content:
ByEuropean Southern Observatory (ESO)July 26, 2023
At the center of this image is the young star V960 Mon, located over 5000 light-years away in the constellation Monoceros. Dusty material with the … [+9895 chars]

articles.title: Nasa briefly loses contact with ISS after power outage and relies on backup systems for first time - The Guardian
articles.description: Loss of communications with International Space Station forced Nasa to rely on Russian systems instead
